name: Adventure
overview:
Atari 2600 port created by pacnsacdave.

An evil magician has stolen the Enchanted Chalice, and has hidden it somewhere in the kingdom. The object of the game is ti recover the Enchanted Chalice, and return it to the Golden Castle, where it belongs. This will be no easy task, as the evil magician has created three dragons to hinder you from accomplishing your goal.
